server.name: io.github.shinpr/mcp-image
server.description: AI image generation MCP server using Nano Banana Pro with intelligent prompt enhancement

environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini API key for image generation (get from https://aistudio.google.com/apikey)
environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Absolute path to directory where generated images will be saved (defaults to ./output)
environmentVariables.name: IMAGE_OUTPUT_DIR

environmentVariables.description: Set to 'true' to disable automatic prompt optimization and use direct prompts
environmentVariables.name: SKIP_PROMPT_ENHANCEMENT
